task.title: Creating an Email Account
task.shortdesc: Email stands for electronic mail, and is the main communication medium used for computers.

context.p: There are many different email servers, but since you have already worked some with Google, we will use Google's email provider, Gmail.

step.cmd: Open Google Chrome, and in the top search bar, enter accounts.google.com/signup.

Enter your information, and be sure to choose a username and password you can easily remember. It may be beneficial to write them down somewhere safe. After filling out all of the information, click Next Step near the bottom of the page.
Google's Privacy and Terms will open, and you will need to scroll down and click I Agree.
Continue to your email account, and Gmail will walk you through the simple functions of navigations with on-screen prompts.
step.stepresult: You have successfully created your email account! Use it to send and receive your Microsoft Word documents to your friends' email addresses or send messages to family using their email addresses.
